const hand = [];

class Quiz extends Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      visible: false,
      images: hand,
      names: hand,
    };
  }

  makeRandomFan = () => {
    // choose random tiles
    const picker = _.sampleSize(tiles, 14);
    const sortedHand = picker.sort((a, b) => (a.name > b.name && 1) || -1);

    // // create array with tile images
    // const imgHand = _.map(picker, "img");
    // const sortedHand = imgHand.sort();
    // // create array with tile names
    // const nameHand = _.map(picker, "name");
    // const sortedNameHand = nameHand.sort();
    // // create array with correct alt text
    // const alts = _.map(picker, "alt");
    // const sortedAlts = alts.sort();
    this.setState({
      ...this.state,
      visible: !this.state.visible,
      images: sortedHand.img,
      names: sortedHand.name,
    });
  };

  render() {
    let fan = null;
    if (this.state.visible) {
      fan = (
        <div className="fan">
          <div className="fanTiles">
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.images[0]}
              alt={this.state.names[0] + "mahjong tile"}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[1]}
              alt={this.state.altText[1]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[2]}
              alt={this.state.altText[2]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[3]}
              alt={this.state.altText[3]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[4]}
              alt={this.state.altText[4]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[5]}
              alt={this.state.altText[5]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[6]}
              alt={this.state.altText[6]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[7]}
              alt={this.state.altText[7]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[8]}
              alt={this.state.altText[8]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[9]}
              alt={this.state.altText[9]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[10]}
              alt={this.state.altText[10]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[11]}
              alt={this.state.altText[11]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[12]}
              alt={this.state.altText[12]}
            />
            <img
              className="fanImgQ"
              src={this.state.tiles[13]}
              alt={this.state.altText[13]}
            />
          </div>
        </div>
      );
    }

    return (
      <div>
        <header>
          <Navbar />
        </header>
        <body className="mBody">
          <h1>Fan Quiz</h1>
          <h3>
            Practice recognizing fan by guessing how many points the displayed
            hand is worth.
          </h3>
          {fan}
          <button
            className="hollowButton"
            onClick={() => {
              this.makeRandomFan();
            }}
          >
            START
          </button>
        </body>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

export default Quiz;
